abilities.name: Stellar Energy
info: Mickey gains a Stellar Charge every 5 seconds, each granting 10% Attack. (Max Stacks: 3)
Each time an ally uses their Special Ability, Mickey gains a Stellar Charge for 5 seconds. (Max Stacks: 2)
Each time Mickey gains a Stellar Charge and is at 3 or more charges, he activates his Mirror Shield Buff for 10 seconds, reflecting 20% of incoming damage back at his attacker as Direct Damage.

abilities.name: Cosmic Command
info: If Mickey has 3 or more Stellar Charges on him, he Knocks Back and Stuns enemies that are activating their Special Abilities for 2 seconds.
If Mickey has 5 or more Stellar Charges on him, he Knocks Back and Stuns all enemies for 2 seconds instead.
Mickey Heals all allies 1% HP for each Stellar Charge on him every second for 4 seconds, then removes all Stellar Charges.

abilities.name: Mirror Master
info: Mickey's Mirror Shield Buff reflects an additional 15% damage back at his attacker as Direct Damage.
Each time Mickey uses his Special Ability, he grants a Mirror Shield Buff to all other allies for 10 seconds. (Max Stacks: 1)

talents.name: Stellar Fortitude
talents.info: Grants +20% Health at the start of an encounter.

talents.name: Innate Strength
talents.info: Grants +20% Attack at the start of an encounter.

talents.name: Power Cascade
talents.info: Each time an ally activates their Special Ability, Mickey grants them a 10% Attack Buff, plus 10% Attack for each Stellar Charge on Mickey for 10 seconds. [Max Stacks: 1]

talents.name: Empowered Protection
talents.info: Each time an ally activates their Special Ability, Mickey grants them a 10% Defense Buff, plus 10% Defense for each Stellar Charge on Mickey for 10 seconds. [Max Stacks: 1]

talents.name: Focusing Light
talents.info: Each time an ally activates their Special Ability, Mickey grants them a 10% Focus Buff, plus 10% Focus for each Stellar Charge on Mickey for 10 seconds. [Max Stacks: 1]

talents.name: Stellar Boon
talents.info: Each time Mickey activates his Special Ability, he has a 100% chance to grant all other allies a Stellar Boon Buff, reducing the Cooldown of their next Special Ability by 2 seconds. [Max Stacks: 1] If Mickey is defeated before the Stellar Boon Buff activates, it is removed.
